Package ro.tuiasi

Class AudioRecorder

java.lang.Object
ro.tuiasi.AudioRecorder
public class AudioRecorder extends Object
This class handles audio recording using a microphone.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private final AudioFormat
    format
    The audio format used for recording.
    private TargetDataLine
    microphone
    The target data line from which audio data is captured.
    protected Thread
    recordingThread
    The thread responsible for recording audio.
    private boolean
    running
    A flag indicating whether the recording is currently running.

    Description
    AudioRecorder()
    Constructor that initializes the microphone line with the specified audio format.

  • Field Details

    • format

      private final AudioFormat format
      The audio format used for recording. 44100.0 Hz sample rate, 16-bit sample size, 2 channels (stereo), signed samples, little-endian byte order.

    • microphone

      private TargetDataLine microphone
      The target data line from which audio data is captured.

    • recordingThread

      protected Thread recordingThread
      The thread responsible for recording audio.

    • running

      private volatile boolean running
      A flag indicating whether the recording is currently running.

  • Constructor Details

    • AudioRecorder

      public AudioRecorder()
      Constructor that initializes the microphone line with the specified audio format.

  • Method Details

    • startRecording

      public void startRecording(String filename)
      Starts the recording process and saves the recorded audio to the specified file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the file to save the recorded audio.

    • isSilent

      private boolean isSilent(byte[] buffer, int numBytesRead)
      Checks if the audio buffer contains silence.
      Parameters:
      buffer - The audio buffer.
      numBytesRead - The number of bytes read from the microphone.
      Returns:
      True if the buffer contains silence, false otherwise.

    • calculateRMS

      private double calculateRMS(byte[] buffer, int numBytesRead)
      Calculates the Root Mean Square (RMS) value of the audio buffer.
      Parameters:
      buffer - The audio buffer.
      numBytesRead - The number of bytes read from the microphone.
      Returns:
      The RMS value of the buffer.

    • saveToFile

      private void saveToFile(byte[] audioData, String filename) throws IOException
      Saves the recorded audio data to a file.
      Parameters:
      audioData - The audio data to save.
      filename - The name of the file to save the audio data.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
